name: Mega Diancie Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A mega diancie skin made for Pokemon Showdown servers. If you have any question, you can find me at servers such as origin.
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    8ᵗʰ May 2015:
      - fixed a couple of issues you would have using this skin on psim.us servers.

    13ᵗʰ May 2015:
      - changed the .switchselect button's color to be more visible (battle fix).
      - tweaked .jslider .jslider-value and .jslider .jslider-label (teambuilder fixes).

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.

    4ᵗʰ December 2015:
      - fixed battles' CSS;
